name: SpaceShooterGame
description:
move with the arrow keys,

shoot with z and focus with c

the power bar shows you how strong you are when it is full mow down your enemies!

the charge bar is your weapon battery, don't let it run out or you won't be able to shoot! don't worry too much though, it refills by itself in due time.

the hp bar is your life! if it runs out, game over!

P power ups make you shoot more bullets and charge faster!

O power ups are point ups!

H power ups are hp ups!

beware! you can only get hit on the center of your ship, press C to see your hitbox

Destroy the enemies for great justice! get a large score!
